name: Out There (AudreyL)
description:
A reporter just arrived in Everett Valley, Arizona, to interview residents about alien sightings. When she gets there, however, there's no one to be found. Shelly Fay, determined to get a story, investigates.

Started development in August 2020 for Senior Workshop class at UCF and is being made in Unity. The development team consists of fourteen students: two producers (one programming lead and other art lead), one creative director, seven artists, two programmers, one writer, and one audio designer.

My role as Producer and Art Lead is to organize the team schedule (focusing on artists), track tasks, create burndown and Gantt charts, work collaboratively, create medium and high poly models for the semi-realistic environments and materials, create UI art/wireframes, and implement assets.
